inclusion.criterion: Subjects able and willing to comply with the requirements of the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other diseases and medications known to interfere with bone or mineral metabolism
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant renal impairment as indicated by serum creatinine levels above the normalized range for age
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Actual or planned pregnancy (in alendronate group females must not be planning to conceive during the two years following the study) or breast-feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The lack of effective non-hormonal contraception in females with child-bearing capability (in alendronate group)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Paget's disease of bone, but is not taking bisphosphonates. Sister had similar problems and was diagnosed with Paget's at age 52.
